ch.nolix.primitive.helper

Class ArrayHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.primitive.helper.ArrayHelper

  • public final class ArrayHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The ArrayHelper provides functions to handle arrays. Of the ArrayHelper class no instance can be created.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
